title: LTTE campaign delayed Rajiv Gandhi’s killers’ hanging, source says
content: Submitted by Walter Jayawardhana NEW DELHI: Three Rajiv Gandhi assassins have opposed the execution of the death sentence awarded to them by pointing to the 12 year-lag between the Supreme Court’s confirmation of the high court’s order to send them to the gallows and the rejection of the mercy petition by President. Behind this argument,…
